attributes.action: Increase all minimum sizes of every fish species to allow them to spawn at least once.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: So many minimum sizes do not take into account for the age and size that a particular species of fish has to reach before it can spawn. By killing a fish before it has the chance to spawn we reduce the amount of eggs that are fertilized and ultimately the size of the stock. This can also affect the gene pool which makes the fish stocks left less able to cope with disease and natural pressures. More and bigger fish are beneficial to both commercial fishermen and sea anglers alike, it may also allow the commercial fleet to grow sustainably in the future instead of total decline.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
